group_1.narration: [textBlack:My chocolate hunting mission found@itself an unexpected rival.]

group_1.textLeft: Pink Tapir's exclusive Valentine's Day chocolate…
I didn't think you'd also be after them, Kyoko.

group_1.textRight: I mean, they're really expensive leading up@to Valentine's Day.

group_1.textLeft: It can't be helped since they use ultra@high-class ingredients.
But, if I can grab a whole bunch of them now...
Then every day will be like Valentine's Day!

group_1.textRight: That makes you my rival, then.

group_1.textLeft: If that's how it must be.
…Wait a minute, the war has only just begun.
With how things are going, tomorrow is gonna@end up the same as today.
We'll just keep running into each other.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's gonna be a scramble.
They're in short supply this year, so only few@stores are puttin' them on sale.

group_1.textLeft: That's a trap. The official store by the station@will sell them for 70% off.

group_1.textRight: Any discount higher than that is an instant buy.@...In other words, this is a competition.

group_1.textLeft: By the look of things, it sure is!

group_1.textRight: How 'bout we split up and share the info on@the stores we visit?

group_1.textLeft: If we work together, then we can check out@twice as many places!

group_1.textRight: Sounds good to me. We'll split the chocolate@50-50 afterwards, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Of course! Our alliance is now official!

group_1.textRight: Let's head straight for the Pink Tapir store@by the station, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Only a few stores will be selling them cheaper@than that location this time of year.

group_1.narration: [textBlack:And with that, our chocolate hunter@alliance was established.]
